snippet: Carl Ducasse and a friend had gone out for a milkshake when they were confronted by two men asking for money, the police said.
abstract: Bronx teenager Carl Ducasse is fatally stabbed around corner from his home after refusing to give robber $2.
lead_paragraph: Carl Ducasse and a friend had gone out for a milkshake when they were confronted by two men asking for money, the police said.

headline.main: Bronx Teenager Is Stabbed to Death Over $2
headline.print_headline: Bronx Teenager on an Errand Is Stabbed to Death Over $2
